control.name: ceShowDropDown
control.description: Specifies whether this TokenEdit control's drop-down list should be displayed.

control.name: seDropDownRowCount
control.description: Specifies the maximum number of drop-down menu items for this TokenEdit.

control.name: cbeCheckMode
control.description: Specifies the TokenEdit control's item check mode.

control.name: seMaxExpandLines
control.description: Specifies the maximum number of lines this TokenEdit can occupy.

control.name: ceShowPopupPanel
control.description: The boolean property that specifies whether or not the peek panel should be displayed once the scenario specified via the ShowMode property occurs.

control.name: cbePopupPanelLocation
control.description: Allows you to specify whether the peek panel will be displayed above the corresponding token, below it or relative to the mouse cursor.

control.name: ceShowItemRemoveButton
control.windowcaption: Show Remove Token Buttons in DropDown
control.description: Specifies whether items within this TokenEdit control's drop-down list should display the 'remove' icon.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: Specifies whether this TokenEdit's drop-down list should display a size grip.

control.name: cbeEditValueSep
control.description: Specifies the character used to separate the TokenEdit.EditValue property value into multiple text blocks.

control.name: cbeDropDownMode
control.description: Specifies the way this TokenEdit's drop-down list is displayed.

control.name: cbeEditMode
control.description: Specifies whether an end-user can manually enter and validate any desired text within this TokenEdit.
